title: Gravitational potential energy - 2 blocks on ramp

content.question: In Figure <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, a block of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> has speed <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math> when it reaches the bottom of a ramp. When the block reaches the top of the ramp, the height of the block has increased by <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>h</mi></math> and the gravitational potential energy of the block-Earth system has changed by an amount <math alttext="delta U sub g 1, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>U</mi><mrow><mi>g</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></math>. In Figure <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, a block of mass <math alttext="2 m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi></math> has speed <math alttext="the fraction v over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>2</mn></math> when it reaches the bottom of the same ramp. When the block reaches the top of the ramp, the height of the block increases by <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>h</mi></math> and the gravitational potential energy of the block-Earth system changes by an amount <math alttext="delta U sub g 2, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>U</mi><mrow><mi>g</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math>. Which of the following correctly relates <math alttext="delta U sub g 2, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>U</mi><mrow><mi>g</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math> to <math alttext="delta U sub g 1, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>U</mi><mrow><mi>g</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="delta U sub g 2, end sub, equals the fraction delta U sub g 1, end sub, over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>U</mi><mrow><mi>g</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>U</mi><mrow><mi>g</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta U sub g 2, end sub, equals delta U sub g 1, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>U</mi><mrow><mi>g</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>U</mi><mrow><mi>g</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta U sub g 2, end sub, equals 2 times, open parenthesis, delta U sub g 1, end sub, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>U</mi><mrow><mi>g</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>U</mi><mrow><mi>g</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="delta U sub g 2, end sub, equals 4 times, open parenthesis, delta U sub g 1, end sub, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>U</mi><mrow><mi>g</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>U</mi><mrow><mi>g</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="delta U sub g 2, end sub, equals 2 times, open parenthesis, delta U sub g 1, end sub, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>U</mi><mrow><mi>g</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>Δ</mtext><msub><mi>U</mi><mrow><mi>g</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>
